column4: i have a computer with a DVD+RW , CD-RW/DVD and 2 HD in RAID0 and the ubuntu-live don't boot. What i do ? Thanks!
check in bios if it boots from either CD device at first priority
only the ubuntu not boot in this PC
does that live cd boot on other machines ?
Slackshire does that live cd boot on other machines ?
does it skips ubuntu and boots other system or just freezes? what are the symptoms?
In process of boot have this problem: "No common CD-ROM drive was detected."
no idea man, did you try googling on this prhase ?
thats really funny. out of ideas...
